# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and high-quality craftsmanship, it's truly a valuable asset. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $95. This is an excellent chance to experience the benefits of our product at a discounted rate. I believe you'll find it to be a worthwhile investment. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
